location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 20: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, reports that Captain Charles Sealy, Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf, has informed him of the necessity of dispatching the Antelopeto Bombay for the purpose of having it refitted. Stannus states the case for the reinforcement of the squadron, on the grounds that only four cruisers remain available for duties.
